name: bfv-robot-qq-manager
description: 战地五QQ机器人服管系统

scripts.build: tsc && ncc build dist/index.js -o dist && pkg dist/index.js -t win -o bfv-manager-win.exe --public && pkg dist/index.js -t linux -o bfv-manager-linux.sh --public
scripts.bomb: tsc && ncc build dist/others/bombScanManager.js -o dist/bomb && pkg dist/bomb/index.js -t linux -o bombScanManager.sh --public
scripts.comp: tsc && ncc build dist/others/competitionSystem.js -o dist/comp && pkg dist/comp/index.js -t linux -o competitionSystem.sh --public
scripts.detail: tsc && ncc build dist/dataStatistics.js -o dist/detail && pkg dist/detail/index.js -t win -o dataStatistics.exe --public

author: newline星空
